name: @jpoly1219/context-extractor
description: Extract relevant context from an incomplete program sketch.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/ && npx tsc && npm run copy-deps
scripts.copy-deps: npm run copy-lsp-client && npm run copy-ocaml
scripts.copy-ocaml: shx mkdir -p dist/src/ocaml-utils/ && shx cp -r src/ocaml-utils/_build dist/src/ocaml-utils/_build/
